items.sentence: We should just tell Tom that he can't do that.
My father and my brother work at that factory.
I heard shots coming from inside the building.
The children are still playing in the sandbox.
Tom took Mary's hand and sat down next to her.
Did you meet anybody interesting at the party?
If I were you, I'd give Tom a good talking to.
You won't find anybody who'll do that for you.
Everybody at school knows that Tom can't swim.
I used to be able to do that, but not anymore.
